Text: In the last 14 days, did you meet anyone who has coronavirus?
Translation: Dalam 14 hari yang lalu, adakah anda bertemu sesiapa sahaja yang mempunyai coronavirus?

Text: Who? What is your relationship with them?
Translation: Who? Apakah hubungan anda dengan mereka?

Text: How many days ago did you meet them? (There is a number chart in the sidebar if they cannot answer)
Translation: Berapa hari yang lalu adakah anda bertemu dengan mereka? (Terdapat carta nombor dalam bar sisi jika mereka tidak dapat menjawab)

Text: How long were you with him/her?
Translation: Berapa lama anda dengan dia / dia?

Text: In the last 14 days, did you travel out of Singapore? If yes, tell us the countries in English.
Translation: Dalam 14 hari yang lalu, adakah anda melancong ke luar Singapura? Jika ya, beritahu kami negara-negara dalam bahasa Inggeris.

Text: Do you have a fever?

How many days?
(You may use this for multiple symptoms)
Translation:
Berapa hari?
(Anda boleh menggunakan ini untuk pelbagai simptom)

Text: Did you measure it with a thermometer? If you did, what was the highest reading?
Translation: Adakah anda mengukurnya dengan termometer? Jika anda lakukan, apa yang bacaan yang paling tinggi?

Text: Runny nose?
Cough?
Sore throat?
Difficulty breathing?
Do you have diarrhoea? How many times a day?
Translation: Adakah anda mengalami cirit-birit? Berapa kali sehari?

Text: Rash?
Any pain? Specifically, any chest pain?
Point to the place.
Do you have any past medical history?
Translation: Adakah anda mempunyai apa-apa sejarah perubatan lalu?

Text: Please point to which ones.
Asthma
Pneumonia
Hypertension
Hyperlipidemia
Diabetes
Heart problems
Kidney problems
Loss of taste
Lost of Smell
Do you have a drug allergy?
Do you smoke? If yes, how many cigarettes a day?
Translation: Adakah anda merokok? Jika ya, berapa banyak rokok sehari?

Text: Do you drink? If yes, how much (number of bottles a week, type of alcohol)?
Translation: Adakah kamu minum? Jika ya, berapa banyak (bilangan botol seminggu, jenis alkohol)?

Text: If you have any other problems, you can tell me in English.
Translation: Jika anda mempunyai sebarang masalah lain, anda boleh beritahu saya dalam bahasa Inggeris.

Text: I’m going to examine you.
Tell me if you feel more pain.
Translation: Beritahu saya jika anda berasa lebih sakit.

Text: Please remove your shirt.
Keep taking deep breaths through your mouth.
Translation: Terus mengambil nafas dalam-dalam melalui mulut anda.

Text: Say "99" when I listen with my stethoscope.
Translation: Mengatakan "99" apabila saya mendengar dengan stetoskop saya.

Text: I'm going to put this cotton bud into your nostril. You will feel strange but it is not painful
Translation: Saya akan meletakkan putik kapas ini ke dalam lubang hidung anda. Anda akan berasa pelik tetapi ia tidak menyakitkan

Text: This is to test for coronavirus
Translation: Ini adalah untuk ujian bagi coronavirus

Text: Tilt your head back
If coronavirus positive, we call your phone by tomorrow.
Translation: Jika positif coronavirus, kita panggil telefon anda dengan esok.

Text: If coronavirus negative, we send you SMS (text) after 3 days
Translation: Jika coronavirus negatif, kami menghantar SMS (teks) selepas 3 hari

Text: Later, you will do an X-ray
There is no sign of infection on your X-ray
Translation: Tidak ada tanda-tanda jangkitan pada sinar-X anda

Text: You can go back soon.
Translation: Anda boleh kembali tidak lama lagi.

Text: Wait here, do not leave this area
Translation: Tunggu di sini, tidak meninggalkan kawasan ini

Text: You have to stay in the hospital for a few days
Translation: Anda perlu tinggal di hospital selama beberapa hari

Text: We need to transfer you to another location.
Translation: Kita perlu memindahkan anda ke lokasi yang lain.

Text: I'll give you medicine to make you feel better
Translation: Saya akan memberikan anda ubat untuk membuat anda berasa lebih baik

Text: You must not work for next 5 days.
Translation: Anda tidak perlu bekerja untuk 5 hari akan datang.

Text: You must come back if you have problems with breathing.
Translation: Anda mesti kembali jika anda mempunyai masalah dengan pernafasan.

Text: You must come back if you do not recover completely after 5 days
Translation: Anda mesti kembali jika anda tidak sembuh sepenuhnya selepas 5 hari

Text: Read the handout carefully
Thank you
Good morning / afternoon / evening
I am the nurse
I am the doctor
You are in the intensive care unit.
Translation: Anda berada di dalam unit rawatan rapi.

Text: Today is Monday
Today is Tuesday
Today is Wednesday
Today is Thursday
Today is Friday
Today is Saturday
Today is Sunday
You are getting better
We will remove the breathing tube when you are better
Translation: Kami akan mengeluarkan tiub pernafasan apabila anda lebih baik

Text: You can talk after we remove the breathing tube
Translation: Anda boleh bercakap selepas kami mengeluarkan tiub pernafasan

Text: Take a deep breath
Give me a big cough
Don’t struggle
Don’t move
Lift up your arm
Lift up your leg
Squeeze my hand
Show me two fingers
Open your mouth
Stick out your tongue
Open your eyes
I’m going to shine a light into your eyes. It will be bright.
Translation: Saya akan bersinar cahaya ke dalam mata anda. Ia akan menjadi terang.

Text: Your lungs are weak. We are going to insert a breathing tube to help you breathe
Translation: paru-paru anda lemah. Kami akan memasukkan tiub pernafasan untuk membantu anda bernafas

Text: You are going to sleep now
We are turning you onto your belly to help your lungs expand
Translation: Kita menjadikan anda ke perut anda untuk membantu paru-paru anda mengembangkan

Text: We are inserting a tube to help you pass urine
Translation: Kami memasukkan tiub untuk membantu anda membuang air kecil

Text: We are inserting a tube through your nose
Translation: Kami memasukkan tiub melalui hidung anda

Text: We are going to give you an injection in your neck to give you medications
Translation: Kami akan memberi anda suntikan di leher anda untuk memberikan anda ubat-ubatan

Text: We are going to give you an injection in your arm to measure your blood pressure
Translation: Kami akan memberi anda suntikan di lengan anda untuk mengukur tekanan darah anda

Text: We will give you sleeping medications.
Translation: Kami akan memberi anda ubat tidur.

Text: We will give you painkillers.
Translation: Kami akan memberi anda ubat penahan sakit.

Text: We are giving you medication to keep your blood pressure up.
Translation: Kami memberikan anda ubat untuk mengekalkan tekanan darah anda.

Text: We are going to remove the breathing tube.
We are going to suck out your phlegm
Translation: Kita akan menyedut keluar kahak anda

Text: We are going to clean you with a sponge
Translation: Kita akan menyucikan kamu dengan span

Text: Turn left
Turn right
We will change your diapers
Lift up your leg
We are going to sit you up
We are going to shift you up the bed
Translation: Kita akan beralih anda ke atas katil

Text: We are going to clean your mouth
Do not swallow the gargle
